parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ExtraCheckServers
parameter.description: A comma-delimited list of DNS servers to check.

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.Catawampus.
object.description: Support for debugging the catawampus daemon itself.

parameter.name: RuntimeEnvInfo
parameter.description: Information about the runtime environment, useful for debugging.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables profiling.

parameter.name: Result
parameter.description: Current profiling result, updated when profiler is enabled and then disabled.

parameter.name: Stats
parameter.description: Text description of the N most expensive PeriodicStatistics to sample.

parameter.name: Notifications
parameter.description: Text description of the N most expensive Notifications to sample.

parameter.name: ServiceNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: The number of instances of {{object|.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.DynamicDNS.Service.{i}.}}.

object.description: Each instance is a Dynamic DNS provider to update as the device Internet Address changes.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enable this entry.

parameter.name: ServiceName
parameter.description: The name of the Dynamic DNS service provider, for example: dyndns@dyndns.org OR statdns@dyndns.org OR custom@dyndns.org default@freedns.afraid.org default@zoneedit.com default@no-ip.com

parameter.name: ServiceURL
parameter.description: The URL name of the Dynamic DNS service provider.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: The status of this entry. {{enum}} The {{enum|Misconfigured_NoServiceName}} value indicates that the ServiceName is undefined or invalid.

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: The username to use when logging in.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: The password to use when logging in.

parameter.name: Domain
parameter.description: The name of the domain(s) to register with the Dynamic DNS service. Though it is expected that only a single domain will be present here, multiple domains can be specifyed by separating them with commas.

parameter.name: UpdateFrequency
parameter.description: How frequently to update the service, in in {{units}}.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables the iBeacon.

parameter.name: UUID
parameter.description: UUID to send in beacons.

parameter.name: Major
parameter.description: Major number to send in beacons.

parameter.name: Minor
parameter.description: Minor number to send in beacons.

parameter.name: TxPower
parameter.description: Transmit power to populate in beacons. This is not the amount of TX Power to use, it is a field in the beacon which tells the recipient what power to expect to see at 1 meter distance from the device. This allows the recipient to calculate how far away the beacon must therefore be.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ActualBitRate
parameter.description: The current link speed of this interface (expressed in {{units}}).

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ActualDuplexMode
parameter.description: The current duplex mode of this connection.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_DiscardFrameCnts
parameter.description: The count of discarded frames per queue.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_DiscardPacketsReceivedHipri
parameter.description: Number of discarded packets which were considered high priority.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_LedStatusNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: The number of instances of {{object|.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_LedStatus.{i}.}}.

object.name: Device.DeviceInfo.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_LedStatus.{i}.
object.description: This object reflects the state of an LED or other indicator light.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of this LED. This text MUST be sufficient to distinguish this object from others.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: A description of the state of the indicator.

object.name: Device.DeviceInfo.TemperatureStatus.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Fan.{i}.
object.description: This object represents information that the device has obtained via sampling a fan, blower, or other temperature management device.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of this fan. This text MUST be sufficient to distinguish this fan from others.

parameter.name: RPM
parameter.description: Measured speed of the fan, in revolutions/minute.

parameter.name: DesiredRPM
parameter.description: The calculated speed the system believes the fan should run at, given the current temperature. Measured in revolutions/minute.

parameter.name: DesiredPercentage
parameter.description: Percentage for the level that the fan should run at.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_TextConfig
parameter.description: For debugging purposes, the current contents of the DHCP server configuration file (for example, dnsmasq.conf).

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_NTPServers
parameter.description: {{list}} List items represent NTP servers offered to DHCP clients.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ClientID
parameter.description: Value of the DHCP Client Identifier (Option 61) as defined in {{bibref|RFC2132}} sent by the DHCP client.

parameter.name: IP4Address
parameter.description: The first IPv4 address known for the Host, or an empty string if there are no addresses.

parameter.name: IP6Address
parameter.description: The first IPv6 address known for the Host, or an empty string if there are no addresses.

object.name: Device.Hosts.Host.{i}.X_CATAWAMPUS_ORG_ClientIdentification.
object.description: Fingerprinting information to identify a client device.

parameter.name: DhcpFingerprint
parameter.description: A comma separated list of DHCP options requested by this client, in the order they were requested. Ex: 1,28,3,15,6,42

parameter.name: SsdpServer
parameter.description: The Server: line from an SSDP message sent by this client. Ex: "Windows-Vista/6.0 UPnP/1.0"

parameter.name: AsusModel
parameter.description: The model name advertised using the ASUS Discovery Protocol.

parameter.name: DnsSdName
parameter.description: The hostname advertised using DNS-SD.

parameter.name: NetbiosName
parameter.description: The hostname advertised using NETBIOS.

parameter.name: WifiAssociationDuration
parameter.description: A comma-separated list containing the Duration field from the last N Wifi Association frames.

parameter.name: WifiAuthenticationDuration
parameter.description: A comma-separated list containing the Duration field from the last N Wifi Authentication frames.

parameter.name: WifiProbeDuration
parameter.description: A comma-separated list containing the Duration field from the last N Wifi Probe frames.

parameter.name: WifiProbeBroadcastDuration
parameter.description: A comma-separated list containing the Duration field from the last N Wifi Probe frames sent to a NULL SSID (meaning Broadcast).

parameter.name: WifiProbeElements
parameter.description: A string description of the Information Elements present in the most recent Probe frame from this station.

parameter.name: WifiProbeBroadcastElements
parameter.description: A string description of the Information Elements present in the most recent Probe frame sent to a NULL SSID (meaning Broadcast).

parameter.name: WifiAssociationElements
parameter.description: A string description of the Information Elements present in the most recent Association frame from this station.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_IP4Address
parameter.description: First IPv4 address from IPv4Address.{i}, or an empty string if there are no addresses.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_IP6Address
parameter.description: First IPv4 address from IPv6Address.{i}, or an empty string if there are no addresses.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ExtraTracing
parameter.description: Enables or disables additional trace messages from mocad.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_DiscardFrameCnts
parameter.description: The count of discarded frames per queue.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_DiscardPacketsReceivedHipri
parameter.description: Number of discarded packets which were considered high priority.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxPowerLevel_dBm
parameter.description: The RxPowerLevel in dBm.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxBcastPowerLevel_dBm
parameter.description: The RxBcastPowerLevel in dBm.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxSNR_dB
parameter.description: The Signal/Noise ratio in dB.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_TxBitloading
parameter.description: A description of the signal quality of each subchannel, one character per subchannel.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxBitloading
parameter.description: A description of the signal quality of each subchannel, one character per subchannel.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxPrimaryCwCorrected
parameter.description: Number of code words received with errors and corrected.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxPrimaryCwUncorrected
parameter.description: Number of code words received with errors which could not be corrected.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxPrimaryCwNoErrors
parameter.description: Number of code words received without errors.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxPrimaryCwNoSync
parameter.description: Number of code words received where the PHY could not even sync.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxSecondaryCwCorrected
parameter.description: Number of code words received with errors and corrected.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxSecondaryCwUncorrected
parameter.description: Number of code words received with errors which could not be corrected.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxSecondaryCwNoErrors
parameter.description: Number of code words received without errors.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RxSecondaryCwNoSync
parameter.description: Number of code words received where the PHY could not even sync.

parameter.name: Available
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of available experiments.

parameter.name: Requested
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of desired experiments. It is not an error to request an experiment that is not in Available, although that will have no effect.

parameter.name: Active
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of currently-active experiments. Generally is the intersection between Available and Requested.

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.GFiberTV.
object.description: Container for parameters supporting the Google Fiber TV system.

parameter.name: DevicePropertiesNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: Number of instances of {{object|DeviceProperties}}.

parameter.name: BtDevices
parameter.description: The bluetooth devices config.

parameter.name: BtHHDevices
parameter.description: The bluetooth HH devices config.

parameter.name: BtConfig
parameter.description: The bluetooth device config.

parameter.name: BtNoPairing
parameter.description: Creates a file that will prevent the device from pairing with the remote control over bluetooth, which effectively forces IR mode.

parameter.name: EASHeartbeatTimestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp of the last received Emergency Alert System heartbeat.

parameter.name: EASFipsCode
parameter.description: FIPS Code for the Emergency Alert System.

parameter.name: EASServiceAddress
parameter.description: Multicast address to monitor for the the Emergency Alert System.

parameter.name: EASServicePort
parameter.description: UDP Port number to monitor for the the Emergency Alert System.

parameter.name: TcpAlgorithm
parameter.description: TCP congestion control algorithm to use by default. This setting takes effect after reboot.

parameter.name: UiControlUrl
parameter.description: URL for UI Control.

parameter.name: UiType
parameter.description: UI version to run.

parameter.name: TvBufferAddress
parameter.description: The ip:port address of the buffering service. Enables use of the service if present and non-empty.

parameter.name: TvBufferKey
parameter.description: Key used to allow access to the buffering service.

parameter.name: PermanentFiles
parameter.description: Number of permanent DVR files currently stored.

parameter.name: PermanentMBytes
parameter.description: Number of Megabytes of permanent DVR files currently stored.

parameter.name: TransientFiles
parameter.description: Number of transient DVR files currently stored. Transient files can be deleted as needed by the DVR, as part of its normal operation.

parameter.name: TransientMBytes
parameter.description: Number of Megabytes of transient DVR files currently stored. Transient files can be deleted as needed by the DVR, as part of its normal operation.

parameter.name: SerialNumber
parameter.description: Serial number of the device.

parameter.name: NickName
parameter.description: Nickname of the device.

parameter.name: GvsbServer
parameter.description: URL of the GVSB server.

parameter.name: GvsbChannelLineup
parameter.description: Identifier for the current channel lineup.

parameter.name: GvsbKick
parameter.description: Current Kick value. Whenever the Kick value changes, device will re-fetch the channel list.

parameter.name: EpgPrimary
parameter.description: Multicast IP address and port of the primary EPG feed. For example, "224.254.1.1:5000"

parameter.name: EpgSecondary
parameter.description: Multicast IP address and port of the secondary EPG feed. For example, "224.254.1.2:5000"

parameter.name: EpgUrl
parameter.description: URL of the EPG feed, eg: https://tv.prod.gfsvc.com/static/epginfo/prod

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.HAT.
object.description: Container for parameters supporting the HAT system.

parameter.name: HAT
parameter.description: If set to true, this variable turns off anything related to the HAT system.

parameter.name: Insert
parameter.description: Turns on/off the HAT insertion.

parameter.name: TestCueTones
parameter.description: Turns on/off HAT cue tones parsing.

parameter.name: DVRReplacement
parameter.description: Turns on/off HAT DVR replacement.

parameter.name: HatRequestMaxDelaySecs
parameter.description: Max time to wait before making a hat request.

parameter.name: MinChannelDwellTimeSecs
parameter.description: Min time a channel was viewed before making a hat request.

parameter.name: MinRepeatHatReportIntervalSecs
parameter.description: Max time after which a repeat hat view can be reported.

parameter.name: MinActiveViewingHeuristicSecs
parameter.description: Min time till which a viewing can be considered active.

parameter.name: DiskSpaceLimitGb
parameter.description: Max disk space we can use for hat - in gigabytes.

parameter.name: DiskSpaceLowWatermarkPercent
parameter.description: Percent value of disk space limit we should strive to keep disk usage at.

parameter.name: DiskSpaceHighWatermarkPercent
parameter.description: Percent value of disk space limit we should keep disk usage under.

parameter.name: DiskSpaceCleanupIntervalSecs
parameter.description: Interval (in secs) to cleanup disk space.

parameter.name: HatCatalogPollingIntervalSecs
parameter.description: Polling interval (in secs) to check for an updated hat catalog.

parameter.name: MinImpressionViewDurationPts
parameter.description: Duration (in pts) of an ad viewing that turns it into an impression.

parameter.name: GFASUrl
parameter.description: URL of the GFAS server.

parameter.name: HATContracts
parameter.description: The HAT contracts file.

parameter.name: FetcherThrottlingIntervals
parameter.description: List of intervals for the fetcher to know the bandwidth limit and how many downloads can be performed in that timeframe.

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.SelfTest.
object.description: Parameters for configuring an automated self test.

parameter.name: ServerIP
parameter.description: For clients (ie. TV box) the server (storage box) to connect to. If this parameter is omitted, scans the local network for a server.

parameter.name: AutoRestartEnable
parameter.description: If true, restart the test after it passes or fails.

parameter.name: MaxBitRate
parameter.description: Maximum data transmit rate, in {{units}}. 0 means no transmission, and values less than zero mean unlimited.

parameter.name: Mode
parameter.description: The current self-test mode. Set to None to disable the test, StressTest to enable the stress test, or Throughput to run a LAN bandwidth test. Other kinds of tests may be added in the future.

parameter.name: LastResult
parameter.description: The result of the most recent test run. 0 means success.

parameter.name: LastResultTime
parameter.description: The time of the most recent test run.

parameter.name: Log
parameter.description: The most recent output of the test script.

parameter.name: Enabled
parameter.description: SSH daemon enabled and forwarded via remote tunnel.

parameter.name: AuthorizedKeys
parameter.description: RSA public key(s) of permitted remote login, suitable for use by OpenSSHD.

parameter.name: TunnelHost
parameter.description: Hostname to connect for remote tunnel.

parameter.name: TunnelPort
parameter.description: Port to connect for remote tunnel.

parameter.name: TunnelKeyData
parameter.description: Key (PEM encoded) for SSL certificate for tunnel

parameter.name: TunnelCertData
parameter.description: Certificate (PEM encoded) for SSL certificate for tunnel

parameter.name: TunnelCAData
parameter.description: CA data (PEM encoded) for SSL certificate for tunnel

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.Speedtest.
object.description: This object provides access to an IP-layer performance test.

parameter.name: DiagnosticsState
parameter.description: Indicates availability of diagnostic data. {{enum}} If the ACS sets the value of this parameter to {{enum|Requested}}, the CPE MUST initiate the corresponding diagnostic test. When writing, the only allowed value is {{enum|Requested}}. To ensure the use of the proper test parameters (the writable parameters in this object), the test parameters MUST be set either prior to or at the same time as (in the same SetParameterValues) setting the {{param}} to {{enum|Requested}}. When requested, the CPE SHOULD wait until after completion of the communication session with the ACS before starting the diagnostic. When the test is completed, the value of this parameter MUST be either {{enum|Complete}} (if the test completed successfully), or one of the ''Error'' values listed above. If the value of this parameter is anything other than {{enum|Complete}}, the values of the results parameters for this test are indeterminate. When the diagnostic initiated by the ACS is completed (successfully or not), the CPE MUST establish a new connection to the ACS to allow the ACS to view the results, indicating the Event code ''8 DIAGNOSTICS COMPLETE'' in the Inform message. After the diagnostic is complete, the value of all result parameters (all read-only parameters in this object) MUST be retained by the CPE until either this diagnostic is run again, or the CPE reboots. After a reboot, if the CPE has not retained the result parameters from the most recent test, it MUST set the value of this parameter to {{enum|None}}. Modifying any of the writable parameters in this object except for this one MUST result in the value of this parameter being set to {{enum|None}}. While the test is in progress, modifying any of the writable parameters in this object except for this one MUST result in the test being terminated and the value of this parameter being set to {{enum|None}}. While the test is in progress, setting this parameter to {{enum|Requested}} (and possibly modifying other writable parameters in this object) MUST result in the test being terminated and then restarted using the current values of the test parameters.

parameter.name: License
parameter.description: The license and test configuration to be used for the speed test invocation.

parameter.name: Arguments
parameter.description: Arguments to pass to the speedtest. This string will be broken into distinct arguments at whitespaces. Note that no shell is involved, and shell substitutions will not be performed.

parameter.name: Output
parameter.description: The output of the speed test run.

parameter.name: LastResultTime
parameter.description: The time of the most recent speedtest run.

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.Isostream.
object.description: This object provides access to run an IP-layer jitter/throughput test.The results are very detailed and available only via the system logs.

parameter.name: ServerEnable
parameter.description: True if this device should accept incoming connections.

parameter.name: ServerTimeLimit
parameter.description: Automatically disable the server if it runs for more than this many seconds. If zero, there is no limit.

parameter.name: ClientEnable
parameter.description: True if this device should be running a client right now.

parameter.name: ClientDisableIfPortActive
parameter.description: If nonzero, disable isostream client if a TCP connection exists on the given port.

parameter.name: ClientTimeLimit
parameter.description: Automatically disable the client if it runs for more than this many seconds. If zero, there is no limit.

parameter.name: ClientRemoteIP
parameter.description: IP address or hostname of server to connect to. If this is set to the empty string, the client will attemp to connect to the nearest GFiberTV storage box if there is one on the LAN.

parameter.name: ClientMbps
parameter.description: The data rate to use for the client connection in Mbits/sec.

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.HttpDownload.
object.description: Download a URL using http or https. The file is sent to /dev/null, not stored on the device.

parameter.name: DiagnosticsState
parameter.description: Indicates availability of diagnostic data. {{enum}} If the ACS sets the value of this parameter to {{enum|Requested}}, the CPE MUST initiate the corresponding diagnostic test. When writing, the only allowed value is {{enum|Requested}}. To ensure the use of the proper test parameters (the writable parameters in this object), the test parameters MUST be set either prior to or at the same time as (in the same SetParameterValues) setting the {{param}} to {{enum|Requested}}. When requested, the CPE SHOULD wait until after completion of the communication session with the ACS before starting the diagnostic. When the test is completed, the value of this parameter MUST be either {{enum|Complete}} (if the test completed successfully), or one of the ''Error'' values listed above.

parameter.name: IPVersion
parameter.description: The connection can be restricted to IPv4 or IPv6.

parameter.name: LimitMbps
parameter.description: If non-zero, limit the download to this many Mbits/sec.

parameter.name: Result
parameter.description: Text output generated during the HTTP test.

parameter.name: Timeout
parameter.description: Automatically terminate after this many seconds.

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: The URL to access.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_PortRangeSize
parameter.description: Maps a contiguous set of ports starting with {{param|ExternalPort}} mapped to {{param|InternalPort}}, {{param|ExternalPort}} + 1 mapped to {{param|InternalPort}} +1, etc for {{param|X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_PortRangeSize}} ports. A value of zero (0) indicates that no set of ports is specified, i.e. that the mapping is only {{param|ExternalPort}} to {{param|InternalPort}}. If {{param|ExternalPort}} is zero (wildcard), the value of this parameter MUST be ignored. If both {{param|X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_PortRangeSize}} and {{param|ExternalPortEndRange}} are set, the results are undefined.

parameter.name: WanAddress
parameter.description: External IPv4 Address.

parameter.name: LanAddress
parameter.description: Internal IPv4 address.

object.name: Device.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG.Wifiblaster.
object.description: This object provides access to a wifi packet blast tester.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.description: Test duration in seconds.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enable.

parameter.name: Interval
parameter.description: Average time between tests in seconds.

parameter.name: Size
parameter.description: Packet size.
